sentences.en: After all, historically, the two nations have been enemies.
sentences.cn: 毕竟在历史上，两个国家曾经是敌人。

sentences.en: And historically they acted with that sense of stewardship in mind, thinking of what was appropriate for the whole system and not simply for their firm.
sentences.cn: 而且在历史上，他们也在心目中带有那种使命感，思考的是什么对这个社会是最好的，不仅仅是对自己的公司。

sentences.en: Because historically, we have not defined marriage in our constitution.
sentences.cn: 因为历史上我们从未在宪法中给婚姻下过定义。

sentences.en: Fires of natural origin have historically been extremely common throughout the temperate forests.
sentences.cn: 在温带森林中,天然发生的火灾一向是非常普遍的.

sentences.en: Historically speaking, colonial writing is of absorbing value.
sentences.cn: 从历史观点来看, 殖民时代的写作,是有其引人入胜之处的.

sentences.en: Historically speaking, special relativity grew out of classical electromagnetic theory and experiments inspired by it.
sentences.cn: 从历史上讲, 狭义相对论来源于经典电磁学理论及其所引起的多种实验.

sentences.en: Historically these factors had led to a different attitude from the UK banking system.
sentences.cn: 从历史观点看,这些因素就导致了与英国银行不同的营销方式.

sentences.en: Historically, expropriation is rare but very visible.
sentences.cn: 从历史上看, 征用的事例虽然不多,但却非常瞩目.

sentences.en: Historically, royal marriages have been cold, calculating affairs.
sentences.cn: 在历史上，皇室婚姻一直是冷漠且处处算计的事情。

sentences.en: Historically, shifting cultivation was not limited to the tropics.
sentences.cn: 历史上烧垦农业并不限于热带.

sentences.en: Historically, the bank note is the overwhelmingly dominant form of warehouse receipt.
sentences.cn: 在历史上, 银行券是占绝对统治地位的票据形式.

sentences.en: Historically, the procedure has been to determine the'simple'cyanide and the'total'cyanide.
sentences.cn: 这种方法长期以来一直用于测定 “ 简单”氰化物或 “ 总 ” 氰化物.

sentences.en: Historically, the supply curve of hours has followed this configuration.
sentences.cn: 在历史上, 工时的供给曲线是符合这种形状的.

sentences.en: Historically, wafers were waxed onto a metal plate.
sentences.cn: 过去片子是用石蜡固定到金属板上.

sentences.en: It was good drama, but historically inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 戏倒是出好戏, 但与史实有出入.
其后果具有重大的历史影响.

sentences.en: The right to exist and develop thus historically became the urgent demand of the Chinese people.
sentences.cn: 享有生存权和发展权,历史地成为中国人民最迫切的要求.

words.tran_cn: 有历史意义的；历史上著名的
历史的；史学的；基于史实的
历史，历史学；历史记录；来历

trans.tran_cn: 从历史角度，在历史上，以历史观点，根据历史事实
